info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 2:13PM PDT until August 24 at 3:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 315 PM PDT. * At 212 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mountain Springs, or near Red Rock Canyon, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, trees, and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Blue Diamond, Red Rock Canyon, Rocky Gap Campground, Mountain Springs, Lovell Canyon Campground, Spring Mountain Ranch, Sandy Valley and Mt. Potosi. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
